column5: Just wondering how long its been taking to get your passport or passport card lately. My g/f sent in her application last month and we were wondering. I got mine 5 years ago so I don't remember.
IIRC I got mine in 6 weeks..the birth certificate came a few days later..

6 weeks for me, too. We applied back during spring break in March and I have to say the folks at the Post Office did a great job with a big crowd. Made sure that everyone in line had their paperwork in order and took people who needed pictures in for those so there wouldn't be a delay at the front of the line. Kudos to them.

Thanks. I applied for mine in like January in a year when the requirement got extended by a year. My brother made fun of me for it since I "wasted my money." Well the next year he put it off and had to expedite it...costing more than what I had to pay. I found it amusing.
Had to renew for the kids ,Guy at post office said 21 days and it was right around there.
My fishing partner sent his expedited form in on July 27th. Anybody want to take bets on whether or not it will be here by the 9th of August?

On the state department website you can check the status. When my g/f did it said "in process." Looks like you can send an e-mail and they'll give a more definite time frame. She did today and they are suppose to answer in 24 hours.
